issue.title: [C++][Docs] Example of using compute function and output
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14127](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14127). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add a C++ example which demonstrates use of a compute function and output to CSV file.
